thread.title: unmass and biturn help in ff7

post.author: trogdor1134
post.body:
i used umass and got the files i wanted from final fantasy 7 for the PC, then i used biturn to put the file into a .3ds file. but when i open up my 3ds max 8 or 9 it says that it is a bad file type.

am i using biturn wrong?

i could use some help

post.author: BloodRayne
post.body: You need to open .3ds files via the Import menu, not the open menu.
